term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - migration time of micelles, tmc in micellar electrokinetic chromatography
term.title: migration time of micelles

item.text: Experimentally determined as the migration time of a compound that is completely retained in the micellar phase.

sources.item: PAC, 2004, 76, 443. 'Terminology for analytical capillary electromigration techniques (IUPAC Recommendations 2003)' on page 449 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200476020443)

term.citation: Citation: 'migration time of micelles' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.MT06927

term.collection: If you are interested in licensing the Gold Book for commercial use, please contact the IUPAC Executive Director at executivedirector@iupac.org .
term.disclaimer: The International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC) is continuously reviewing and, where needed, updating terms in the Compendium of Chemical Terminology (the IUPAC Gold Book). Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
